title: Payment Item
description: A payment associated with an order that defines the type of payment, the amount and the associated currency.

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionId.description: The unique transaction identifier for this payment item.

xdm:paymentType.title: Payment Type
xdm:paymentType.description: The method of payment for this order. Enumerated, custom values allowed.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for this payment item.
